thread.title: Transgender daughter and dad have an emotional message for Trump - New York Post
thread.title_full: Transgender daughter and dad have an emotional message for Trump - New York Post

title: Transgender daughter and dad have an emotional message for Trump - New York Post
text: 1:58 Transgender daughter and dad have an emotional message for Trump Corey Maison and her transgender father, Eric, do not have a typical father-daughter relationship. Both transitioned from their biological sexes to the opposite genders. Eric Maison, who used to go by Erica, credits his 15-year-old daughter's transition with giving him the courage to take a similar journey. In the current political climate, the debate over transgender bathrooms has fueled debate on both sides of the aisle, and elicited an emotional response from the transgender community. Eric shares an impassioned plea to President Trump about the critical importance of protecting transgender youth. 0:46 Hey MTA: Cut the BS With the rising prices and constant delays, Steve Cuozzo is sick of dealing with the MTA. He especially can't stand being stranded underground with no idea what's causing the delays, aside from a vague announcement referring to a random incident up ahead. 1:09 Dr. Seuss was also kind of racist An examination of Dr. Seuss' early work reveals a dark side to the beloved children's book author. On the 40th anniversary of "The Cat in the Hat," the world celebrated Dr. Seuss, aka Theodor Seuss Geisel, but many fans would be surprised to know the iconic illustrator also held anti-Japanese and racist views. 2:43 Joey the 'human Google' remembers every day he ever lived Joey DeGrandis has a very unusual memory. His so-called "calendar memory" allows the New York resident to recall the day of the week on any given date. The New York Post quizzed the genius about his unique abilities over Skype. Scientists have labeled his condition "HSAM," for highly superior autobiographical memory. 0:45 A doughnut and a grilled cheese made a baby and it’s delicious “The Flamin’ Hot Doughnut Grilled Cheese” has arrived. This savory snack is the collaboration of The Doughnut Project bakery and Clinton Hall, a trendy bar located in New York’s Financial District. The cheesy concoction is served Friday through Sunday as part of a month-long promotion. 1:28 This woman is auctioning off her virginity... for a million dollars Katherine Stone is a 21-year-old woman working at a brothel in Nevada who happens to be a virgin. In an effort to capitalize on her situation, she's decided to auction off the opportunity to deflower her, as long as the price is right. Her ideal price, a cool million dollars. 0:59 White girls are mad about finding out that 'Becky' is insulting Everyone was shocked when Iggy Azalea revealed that "Becky" is actually an insulting term for white women. This was news to everybody, especially white girls.
